protein.general_function: Involved in serine-type endopeptidase inhibitor activity
protein.specific_function: Angiotensin 1-7 is a ligand for the G-protein coupled receptor MAS1. Has vasodilator and antidiuretic effects. Has an antithrombotic effect that involves MAS1-mediated release of nitric oxide from platelets
